As I did not know much about the French Press Coffee Maker when it arrived I thought I had not received all the parts. The instruction sheet that came with it was for the Glass French Press Coffee Maker which showed that I was supposed to receive several strainers which werenâ€™t there. I contacted Amazon Australia but I was told, much to my disappointment, that they couldnâ€™t send me any strainers that I explained were missing. Later that evening I noticed on the instruction sheet the Easyworkz email address to which I immediately sent an email. I wish to thank Easyworkz for their wonderful assistance. After explaining the problem, I was asked to send them a photograph of what I had received and they said that they would help me. They quickly emailed me, indicating that the parts were there but that they had been already assembled and all I had to do was to twist the end to come apart and all the strainers would be there. As I said I knew very little about the French Press Coffee Maker so I was extremely happy when I found that the pieces were not missing but were all there just as they said because I really liked the Easyworkz French Press Coffee Maker. I am very pleased to have it as it makes lovely coffee and the double insulated walls of the Coffee Maker keeps the coffee warm. So a very big thank you to Easyworkz for their great after sales service.

title: Great coffee pot
body:
Fed up of my husband smashing my glass pots, I went in search of an indistinguishable one, that keeps
coffee hot for longer and produces less sediment and so far, this meets the standard.

After the 1st few pots of coffee, I was disappointed to find a lot of sediment remaining in my morning cuppa, however after a closer look, the sieve was folded over around the edge. After taking it apart, hammering to flatten and fiddling about with it, I'm please to report, I now have coffee with much less sediment in it.

Pours well, and the lid can also be rotated to keep the heat from escaping.

Love the fact that it's dishwasher safe and it comes out looking like new, and if it's important to you, it will also look good on any breakfast or dinner table.

Overall a great coffee pot, so 5* from me, however, quality control needs to up their game!
